title: Charge against Melodee Buzzardâ€™s mom dismissed, ankle monitor removed as FBI hunts for missing 9-year-old
text: A California mother had a felony charge dismissed as the FBI continues searching for her missing 9-year-old daughter, Melodee, who was last seen near the Utah-Colorado border.
summary: A California mother had a felony charge dismissed as the FBI continues searching for her missing 9-year-old daughter, Melodee, who was last seen near the Utah-Colorado border.
